channel.title: Removing PI password encryption?
channel.description:
I'm a snoop, I like the ability to see what people's passwords are, but all I see in the character files are a bunch of numbers.
Obviously there's some type of password encryption code somewhere.. +Rep to anyone who can tell me how to get rid of it ;D

item.title: Removing PI password encryption?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

No.

There’s no legit reason to want to see someone’s password.

Read full topic
